snippet: Doubts have surrounded the death of Turgut Ozal in the almost two decades since he suffered an ostensibly natural heart attack while serving as Turkey's president. His remains have now been exhumed to investigate suspicions that he might have been...
abstract: Doubts have surrounded the death of Turgut Ozal in the almost two decades since he suffered an ostensibly natural heart attack while serving as Turkey's president. His remains have now been exhumed to investigate suspicions that he might have been poisoned.

headline.main: Murder Theory Tested as Turkish Leader Is Exhumed
